content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *

                FROM    sys.schemas

                WHERE   name = 'mipins' )

    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [mipins]');

GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW mipins.vw_mipins_hr_protected_data

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
		T10.CalendarDate AS PCDate,
		Left(T10.CalendarMonth,3) AS PCMonth,
		T10.MonthOfYear AS MonthInt,
		concat(Left(T10.CalendarMonth,3),' - ', Right(T10.CalendarYear, 2)) AS PCMonthLatest, 
		concat('-',T10.CalendarYear,Right(100+T10.MonthOfYear,2)) AS MonthYearLatestSortKey,
		T10.CalendarYear AS PCYear,
		T10.FinancialYear AS PCFY,
		concat('FY-',Right(T10.FinancialYear, 2))  AS PCFYLatest,
		T10.FinancialYear AS FYLatestSortKey,
		T1.SourceID AS RefNumber,
		T2.DisabilityCode AS DisabilityText,
		CASE 
			WHEN T2.Description IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
			WHEN T2.Description IN ('DISABLED','Yes') THEN 'Yes'
			WHEN T2.Description IN ('NOT DISABLED', 'No') THEN 'No'
			WHEN T2.Description IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose', '0') THEN 'Unknown'
		END AS Disabled,
		T3.Description AS EthnicOrigin,
		CASE WHEN T3.Description IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
			WHEN T3.Description LIKE 'White%' THEN 'White'
			WHEN T3.Description IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown','0','Not known') THEN 'Unknown'
		   ELSE 'BME'
		END AS Ethnicity,
		CASE
			WHEN T1.ReligionID IS NULL THEN 'NULL'
			ELSE T4.ReligionCode 
		END AS ReligiousDenominationKey,
		CASE
			WHEN T4.ReligionCode IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
			WHEN T4.ReligionCode IN ('None','Agnostic / Atheist') OR LEFT(T4.ReligionCode,3) IN ('ath','agn') THEN 'Agnostic / Atheist'
			WHEN T4.ReligionCode = 'Christian' THEN 'Christian'
			WHEN T4.ReligionCode IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown','0') THEN 'Unknown'
		   	ELSE 'Other Religion'
		END AS Religion,
		T5.Description AS SxO,
		CASE 
			WHEN T5.Description IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
			WHEN T5.Description ='Heterosexual' THEN 'Heterosexual'
			WHEN LEFT(T5.Description,3) IN ('Gay','Les','Bis') THEN 'LGBT'
			WHEN T5.Description IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown','Other','0') THEN 'Unknown'
		    ELSE 'Other'
		END AS SexualOrientation

	--FROM sap_hr.protected_data a
	FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].hr_secure_info_fact T1
	LEFT JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].hr_disability_dim T2 ON T1.DisabilityID = T2.DisabilityID and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
	LEFT JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].hr_diversity_dim T3 ON T1.DiversityID = T3.DiversityID and T3.IsActive = 'Y'
	LEFT JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].hr_religion_dim T4 ON T1.ReligionID = T4.ReligionID and T4.IsActive = 'Y'
	LEFT JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].hr_sxo_dim T5 ON T1.SXOID = T5.SXOID and T5.IsActive = 'Y'
	LEFT OUTER JOIN  [default].[dbo].calendar_dim_plus T10 ON T1.IngestionDate = T10.CalendarDate

    GO
